reviewText: Pity its region 1... it should be also reg. 4!
Best Novela that was ever made!
It's just clips, from the show pieced together.

I love this novela so I was very excited to see this turns out it is just a review of what happened in the novela, its nice I suppose but I was very disappointed, I can't believe they actually sell this, why would anyone truly want to just see an hour long recap of the entire show?

Clips of the telenovela. But you can not use it for a classroom and you can not even process it unless you were a fan and a die hard of the soapopera. There are some annoying introducers all throughout the clips - so useless and typical Univision product...ahhh... sufficating!!!
